item.title: Dark Amber Malt
item.author: jarret.lavallee@gmail.com (jarret)
item.description: So last week I decided that I wanted to start home roasting my own malts. I found some awesome information here. I decided to make the dark amber malt. I set up the oven at 375 and put 2 pounds of malt in the oven for 45 minutes. DAMN did it smell good. I am very excited for this one to be done. I am very excited to try this one out in a brew.
